FirstCard.title: Top Areas of Knowledge
FirstCard.description: Everything that I have learned has been self-taught. I have a lot to learn still and look at any skill that I do have very humbly. I love desigining apps from start to finish and think I have unique perspectives on what data needs to be connected.
FirstCard.subtitle: Top & Improving Skills

SecondCard.title: My Active Learning
SecondCard.description: The reality is that the developer you talk to today, is not the developer that you will talk to tomorrow. I am constantly reading and learning and know that there is a vast pool of knowledge available. I truly believe that the largest asset I can provide you is my tenacity for leanrning and applying my learning.
SecondCard.subtitle: Moderate and Growing Skills

ThirdCard.title: Areas I'm Very Excited About
ThirdCard.description: I wish I could put more into my previous card, but I can only learn so much at once. So, here are some other areas that I am very excited to learn more about.
ThirdCard.subtitle: Future Skills

FourthCard.title: My Favorite Resources
FourthCard.description: I learn from many sources. Here are some of my favorites that really guide my thinking
FourthCard.subtitle: Resources and People
